pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.5.eng: 1. The training rule on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.6.pli: Ime kho panāyasmanto sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:0.6.eng: Venerables, these rules to be trained in come up for recitation.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.2.eng: the monks from the group of six were wearing their sarongs hanging down in front and behind.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.4.pli: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.4.eng: “How can the Sakyan monastics wear their sarongs hanging down in front and behind? They’re just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.5.pli: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.5.eng: The monks heard the complaints of those people,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.6.pli: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.6.eng: and the monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.7.pli: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.7.eng: “How can the monks from the group of six wear their sarongs hanging down in front and behind?”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.8.pli: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.8.eng: After rebuking those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.9.pli: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā chabbaggiye bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.9.eng: Soon afterwards the Buddha had the Sangha gathered and questioned the monks from the group of six:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.10.pli: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.10.eng: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.13.pli: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, puratopi pacchatopi olambentā nivāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.13.eng: “Foolish men, how can you do this?

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.15.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.15.eng: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.16.1.eng: ‘“I will wear my sarong evenly all around,” this is how you should train.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.17.eng: One should wear one’s sarong evenly all around, covering the navel and the knees.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.18.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.18.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, wears his sarong hanging down in front or behind, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.26.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk1:1.27.eng: The first training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:0.5.eng: 10. The second training rule on lifted robes

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdanti …pe… .
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were lifting their robes while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not lift my robe while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.4.eng: One should not lift one’s robe while sitting in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhipitvā antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, lifts his robe on one or both sides while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.11.eng: if he has entered his dwelling;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.14.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.15.eng: The tenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk10:1.16.eng: The first subchapter on evenly all around is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:0.5.eng: 11. The training rule on laughing loudly

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were laughing loudly while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not laugh loudly while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.4.eng: One should not laugh loudly while walking in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahāhasitaṃ hasanto antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, laughs loudly while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.11.eng: if he merely smiles when something is funny;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.14.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk11:1.15.eng: The first training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:0.5.eng: 12. The second training rule on laughing loudly

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mahāhasitaṃ hasantā antaraghare nisīdanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were laughing loudly while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not laugh loudly while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.4.eng: One should not laugh loudly while sitting in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahāhasitaṃ hasanto antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, laughs loudly while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.11.eng: if he merely smiles when something is funny;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.14.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk12:1.15.eng: The second training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:0.5.eng: 13. The training rule on being noisy

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were noisy while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not be noisy while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.4.eng: One should not be noisy while walking in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonto antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, is noisy while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.13.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk13:1.14.eng: The third training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:0.5.eng: 14. The second training rule on being noisy

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā antaraghare nisīdanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were noisy while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not be noisy while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.4.eng: One should not be noisy while sitting in an inhabited area.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonto antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, is noisy while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.8.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:1.9.eng: The fourth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:0.5.eng: 15. The training rule on swaying the body

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti kāyaṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swaying and leaning their bodies while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not sway my body while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.4.eng: One should not sway one’s body while walking in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.5.eng: one should walk keeping one’s body straight.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.5.comm: Sp 2.590: Kāyaṁ paggahetvāti niccalaṁ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca, Kāyaṁ paggahetvā: “one should walk and sit with a steady and straight body, and with upright physical behavior.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati kāyaṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, sways and leans his body while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.9.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.10.eng: The fifth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:0.5.eng: 16. The second training rule on swaying the body

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanti, kāyaṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swaying and leaning their bodies while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not sway my body while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.4.eng: One should not sway one’s body while sitting in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.5.eng: one should sit keeping one’s body straight.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdati kāyaṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, sways and leans his body while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.12.eng: if he has entered his dwelling;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.15.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk16:1.16.eng: The sixth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:0.5.eng: 17. The training rule on swinging the arms

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti bāhuṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swinging and dangling their arms while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not swing my arms while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.4.eng: One should not swing one’s arms while walking in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.5.eng: one should walk keeping one’s arms steady.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati bāhuṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, swings and dangles his arms while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.9.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk17:1.10.eng: The seventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:0.5.eng: 18. The second training rule on swinging the arms

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanti bāhuṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swinging and dangling their arms while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not swing my arms while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.4.eng: One should not swing one’s arms while sitting in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.5.eng: one should sit keeping one’s arms steady.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdati bāhuṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, swings and dangles his arms while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.12.eng: if he has entered his dwelling;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.15.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk18:1.16.eng: The eighth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:0.5.eng: 19. The training rule on swaying the head

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanti sīsaṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swaying and tilting their heads while walking in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not sway my head while walking in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.4.eng: One should not sway one’s head while walking in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.5.eng: one should walk keeping one’s head straight.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchati sīsaṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, sways and tilts his head while walking in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.9.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk19:1.10.eng: The ninth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:0.4.eng: The subchapter on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:0.5.eng: 2. The second training rule on evenly all around

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū puratopi pacchatopi olambentā pārupanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six wore their upper robes hanging down in front and behind. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will wear my upper robe evenly all around,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.4.pli: Parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.4.eng: One should wear one’s upper robe evenly all around, making both corners even.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.5.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento pārupati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.5.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, wears his upper robe hanging down in front or behind, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.13.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk2:1.14.eng: The second training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:0.5.eng: 20. The second training rule on swaying the head

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanti sīsaṃ olambentā …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.2.eng: At that time the monks from the group of six were swaying and hanging their heads while sitting in inhabited areas. …

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.3.1.eng: “‘I will not sway my head while sitting in inhabited areas,’ this is how you should train.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.4.eng: One should not sway one’s head while sitting in an inhabited area;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.5.eng: one should sit keeping one’s head straight.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.6.pli: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdati sīsaṃ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.6.eng: If a monk, out of disrespect, sways and hangs his head while sitting in an inhabited area, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.12.eng: if he has entered his dwelling;

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.15.eng: if he is the first offender.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.16.eng: The tenth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bu-vb-sk20:1.17.eng: The second subchapter on laughing loudly is finished.
